title: Dirty Secrets
description: Sometimes Dirty Secrets won’t stay buried…Leslie Carpenter has done a very bad thing, but for all the right reasons. After hacking into the Harbourview Casino server to prove her boss and others on the executive team were laundering money, losing her job could be the least of her problems. With a potential prison sentence in her future, she turns to her brother's sexy best friend, Chase Jeffries, for help. She has dark secrets she needs to keep, but can she bring herself to trust Chase again? The last time she tangled with this lawyer resulted in more secrets she has to keep buried.Chase needs to keep Leslie out of jail, and not just because it’s his job as a lawyer. He’s secretly been in love with Leslie forever. His feelings will have to take a backseat while they build her defense, because if he fails, he could lose his best friend, his adopted family, and worst of all, Leslie herself. But being this close to her again brings up memories and secrets he's not willing to face.Can they overcome the dirty secrets of their past to find a future together?CW: Contain themes that touch on domestic violence.
author: Kristy Mallory
